  • Method Details

    • simulate

      public Army simulate(TerrainType terrain) throws ArmyEmptyOfUnitsException, NullPointerException
      Simulates a battle between two armies. The method randomises which warrior to attack first for every round. When a warrior dies, it is removed from the army's ArrayList and is replaced by a new warrior. The simulation progresses until one of the armies has no units left. The battle is logged to the file BattleLog.txt.
      Returns:
      the name of the winning army.
      Throws:
      ArmyEmptyOfUnitsException
      NullPointerException

    • clash

      private String clash(Unit attacker, Unit defender, TerrainType terrain)
      Helper method to make the simulate()-method easier to read when randomizing attacks.
      Parameters:
      attacker - attacking unit.
      defender - defending unit.
      Returns:
      string of text to be viewed either in terminal, battle log or GUI output window.
